typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		employee_id as integer,
		last_name as string,
		first_name as string,
		salary as decimal(19,4)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> table1tomerge
source(output(
		EmpID as integer,
		EmpName as string,
		LastName as string,
		Designation as string,
		Department as string,
		JoiningDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> table2merge
table1tomerge, table2merge join(employee_id == EmpID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> merge
merge alterRow() ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
